overview: Darren Marble, Chief Executive Officer & Co-Founder of FilmBreak, has more than 10 years of experience in strategic sales, marketing, operations and management and is an expert in social media and viral marketing. He has sold more than $30 million in software and services during his career to clients including Live Nation, the Screen Actors Guild, Rovi, Demand Media and Kelley Blue Book. Darren also originated, planned and helped execute the most successful social media campaign to date for Susan G. Komen for the Cure®, the world’s leading breast cancer charity.
